name: NOTHING (maskinmask)
description:
This is my first time to participate in ldjam and complete it, it is very very small. I hope that the ideas I want to express can be passed across the language to everyone who plays this game!

because we have nothing, so we need to choose what to get.No choice is absolutely correct or absolutely wrong. We just choose to be different people.
Just like me, I chose to start learning maker games from nothing, because I like it!

I hope that everyone can become what they want to be.

So, let's start to feel the game!

Special thanks to my boyfriend mask and my best friend xudawang!
Although I decided to participate in ldjam from yesterday, I am very happy that I insisted on completing this game.Thank you for your support! I am very happy now!

Finally, thank everyone for playing this game!
